page.title: 16RIDING SCHOOL, COVENTRY.
page.content: { WILLOW FARM RIDING SCHOOL}is where people go to either improve their riding or learn to ride.{ {Opening times:{ { }Wednesday and Thursday evening. Saturday and Sunday all day. {Prices:} Â£4 for a class lesson. Â£6 for a private lesson. {Rides:} Class lessons are in a field with a group of other riders and a tutor is in the middle, teaching. Private lessons are in the field with a tutor. Pub rides are where adults go out to pubiic houses on horses. Picnic rides are where you go out on horses and have a picnic.
